name: Voyage (itch) (DKCris, J0sephL0)
description:
In this game you are a Space Girl in look for her lost family throughout the galaxy.

You will be able to dash from obstacle to obstacle.

Survive and avoid enemies in your path.

Find your family!

Welcome to Voyage, 

    A 3D Adventure Platforming game created by Howard's Angels, that follows a girl in space looking for her family. She will be transported to three wonderful worlds which will have an array of obstacles that she must avoid so she does not succumb to space creatures and worldly hazards. Space Girl comes equipped with various abilities such as:

  • The ability to dash from platform to platform
  • The ability to bounce on and destroy enemies
  • The ability to burst out energy which will eliminate enemies that may be stopping her from returning home. 

Exploring space can be fun 

      Players will find the art and models of the game charming and delightful while also fitting in with the setting. Immersion is the number one goal as you will become entranced by the creative level layouts and learn new and creative ways to escape each area. We also aid the player with an easily navigatable UI system which allows the player to know their health and abilities, access menus they need to, and save whenever they may need a break from the fun. 

Controls

WASD- To Move

SPACEBAR - Jump & dash

Left Mouse Click - Projectile
